dataModel.title: Prototype Veg Plots Database Component Description: communityType
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table stores the information responsible for the representing the relationship between a plot observation and a community type.
entity.entityDescription: There is still some debate whether or not this entity actually belongs here. The issues here are the same as those surrounding the plant taxa database. Do we store all the plant taxa, or in this case all the community types, in a database local to the plots datbase or is there a communication process between the plots database and HDMS. With the plant taxa, we are leaning towards developing our own database component to store information related to plant taxa which will be structurally similar to that same functional component in HDMS and will at some point probably be updated from HDMS. Fortunately, the designers at TNC have been concerned with designing a 'universal' data model which will be capable of storing/tracking either plant taxa or community types or both.
